mapper.select: SELECT msa.staff_id as staffId, mbsi.employeeName as staffName, mea.affair_id as affairId, mea.affair_name as afairName, mea.series as series, mea.system as system, mea.bu as bu FROM mms_staff_affair msa, mms_examination_affair mea, mms_base_staff_info mbsi WHERE msa.staff_id = mbsi.employeeId AND mea.affair_id = msa.affair_id AND msa.evaluator_id = #{evaluatorId}

SELECT med.dimension_id as dimensionId, med.dimension_name as dimensionName, med.mark as mark FROM mms_examination_dimension med, mms_affair_dimension mad WHERE med.dimension_id = mad.dimension_id AND mad.affair_id = #{affairId}
update mms_staff_affair set is_solved = 1 where staff_id = #{staffId} and affair_id = #{affairId}

SELECT msa.staff_id as staffId, mbsi.employeeName as staffName, mea.affair_id as affairId, mea.affair_name as afairName, mea.series as series, mea.system as system, mea.bu as bu FROM mms_staff_affair msa, mms_examination_affair mea, mms_base_staff_info mbsi WHERE msa.staff_id = mbsi.employeeId AND mea.affair_id = msa.affair_id AND msa.is_solved = 1 AND msa.evaluator_id = #{evaluatorId}
